name: Horse Head
description:
A man once dived into psychedelics, he now has accessed his own inside animal!
Play the game and discover what happens inside his mind!


How to play:

WASD - to move/jump.

ESC/P - to pause the game

    - The Yellow mushroom

Makes the horse gets crazy fast and superpowered (can destroy spikes)

- The violet mushroom

Change the entire game to a spiritual world!

-  Spike

Kills you

  - Inverted Horse Head

Kills you :(

- The "Will of Fire" concetrated ball

This ball only appears in spiritual world, and contains the will of fire inside each person, which makes we move / dream!
Some people says this is "essence of GOD" This game was made by:

Nonunknown - Programmer / Game Designer

Leo Bersk - Artist / Game Ideas

Jonpon - Music / SFX

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/ Share your score via twitter with #HorseHead

An entry for 2021 - FireJam
